parameters: And after Celia moved on to the next room...
The deliberately sweet moans echo throughout.
Sadi, hehe...♡ How does the reward taste, Merill?
As I thought... this is the best!♡ I love it so much♡
Hey, Lord Sadi! Ahn♡ How was my performance?♡
\c[27]I made Hayato-kun obsessed with my breasts♡♡

Sadi: Yes... it was the best♡ Thanks to that, I was able to
get close to \c[27]Celia.\c[0]

Sadi: I've also managed to make them accept the perception
of resignation that 'rules aren't perfect, so it can't be
helped if they change'...
Sadi: As expected of my number one subordinate♡

Along with the praise, the movement of my hips begins to
accelerate.

Sadi: But... this time, you're really passionate about your
strategy, aren't you?

Sadi: Even though you usually \c[14]forcefully overlap our
bodies to tempt me\c[0]♡

Because, because, Hayato-kun is so cute♡ I want to dominate
him♡

Haah♡Fuu♡...For that, I have to break his \c[27]heart\c[0]
more than his body♡ So that he can't think of anything but
me♡

Sadi: That's a good mindset for a succubus! Take this!
Receive my love!
Sadi: However... I'll tell you one more thing.

Sadi: Don't get too attached to Hayato. \c[27] After all,
you are mine♡♡\c[0]

Sadi: Now... let's proceed with our plan. Little by little,
to draw the two of them to our side♡
